name: Forbidden Crown
text:
Neither player can activate monster effects in response to this card's activation. Apply these effects to 1 face-up monster on the field, until the end of this turn.
● Its effects are negated.
● It cannot attack.
● It cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects.
● It is unaffected by other cards' activated effects, except its own.
● It cannot be Tributed.
● It cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon.
You can only activate 1 "Forbidden Crown" per turn.
